alert.note: Alert for East Glacier Park Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 03 at 2:40AM MST until March 03 at 8:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Periods of snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations up to 4 inches near Marias Pass with up to 2 inches along the foothills. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...East Glacier Park Region. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will remain slick and hazardous. Blowing and drifting snow could significantly reduce visibility at times. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing snow will reduce visibility at times, and drifting snow may make some roads impassable.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.
